name: Abbess

skills.name: Arrow of Rebuke
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Removes 1 random debuff from this Champion and places it on the target.

skills.name: Mass Impalement
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% Decrease DEF debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Divine Wrath
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage is proportional to this Champion's ATK or the target's highest DEF/ATK. Deals extra 30% C.DMG if target's ATK is highest, ignores 30% DEF if target's DEF is highest.

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally ATK in Faction Crypts by 34%.

masteries: Support: Cycle of Violence, Blood Shield, Kill Streak

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Sometimes does not use A3 on auto, especially vs single targets. May prioritize A2 for DEF Down.

mechanics_advisory: A3 scales with enemy stats, making her hit harder against high DEF/ATK targets. Not optimal for Clan Boss. Best as a wave nuker and DEF Down provider.
